column4: is it worth me using ubuntu on my main pc as well? or is it best to keep xp on one computer ?
that question goes out to anyone lol
that depends entirely on what you use each of them for.  in your position, I'd probably keep both until you're comfortable with which will do what you need better
given BT's track record, I'd try their software only if nothing else works.  if it's working with out it, stay without it
